details: On 9 June, the TU Delft campus was dominated by students' ideas for the future of energy transition. This year, almost all students paid attention in their education to the transition to a society where the energy supply is more sustainable. A large number of ideas and prototypes were on display on 9 June during the Energy Challenge Event that took place as part of the anniversary of the TU Delft.
TU Delft Energy Challenge Event
